description: When attempting to add a new package to a VirtualEnvironment, the user receives an error message stating that the package was not added successfully due to an issue with the package's dependencies. This is a runtime error that occurs when the dependencies of the package are not compatible with the VirtualEnvironment, resulting
code:
# Import necessary packages
import os
import sys
import virtualenv

# Create a VirtualEnvironment
env_name = 'my_venv'
virtualenv.create_environment(env_name)

# Activate the VirtualEnvironment
activate_env = virtualenv
